panels.description: With this panel be aware of the current time interval being used (top right option with the clock) as it will display what nodes have been out during that time entire interval, not just currently out. This can be used to see around when a node had gone out.
panels.title: Nodes Ready

panels.description: With this panel be aware of the current time interval being used (top right option with the clock) as it will display what nodes have been out during that time entire interval, not just currently out. This can be used to see around when a node had gone out.
panels.title: Nodes Not Ready

panels.description: With this panel be aware of the current time interval being used (top right option with the clock) as it will display what pods have been out during that time entire interval, not just currently out. This can be used to see around when a pod had gone out.

defaults.noValue: Currently All Pods Have At Least 1 Running Container

panels.title: Pods With No Running Containers

panels.description: With this panel be aware of the current time interval being used (top right option with the clock) as it will display what pods have been out during that time entire interval, not just currently out. This can be used to see around when a pod had gone out.
panels.title: Number of Containers Ready in Pod {$Namespaces}
